label.en: 18/19 A regular part 1 3 CP LT Eng
label.et: 18/19 S PÕ 1. osa 3 EAP LT Eng

description.en: The basic principles of chemistry will be covered
description.et: Loengus käsitletakse ülevaatlikult kõiki keemia põhimõisteid ja -seoseid.

objectives.en: The goal of the course is to help students develop "chemical insight" - the ability to see matter through chemists' eyes, and to make connections between chemical principles, theory, experimentation, and the world around us.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on anda tudengitele üldine ülevaade keemia põhimõistetest ja aidata neil kujundada "keemilise mõtlemise alused", mis võimaldaksid näha seoseid keemia põhiprintsiipide, teooriate, eksperimentide ja igapäevase elu vahel.

learning_outcomes.en: The student who has passed the course:
* Can describe the electronic structure of the atoms and knows the relations between electronic structure and the properties of atoms
learning_outcomes.et: * oskab kirjeldada aatomite elektronstruktuuri ja selle seoseid aatomite omadustega;

learning_outcomes.en: * Knows different types of chemical bonding and can use this knowledge to predict the properties of substances
learning_outcomes.et: * tunneb keemilise sideme erinevaid liike, nende erinevusi ja mõju aine omadustele;

learning_outcomes.en: * Can predict molecular shape using VSEPR and valence-bond theories
learning_outcomes.et: * oskab ennustada molekuli kuju lähtudes VSEPR ja valentssidemete meetoditest;

learning_outcomes.en: * Knows the main properties of gases, liquids, and solids and relates them to the bonding
learning_outcomes.et: * tunneb gaaside, vedelike ja tahkiste põhilisi omadusi ning nende sõltuvust sidemetest aines;

learning_outcomes.en: * Knows the laws of thermodynamics and how to use them, also for describing of physical and chemical equilibria
learning_outcomes.et: * tunneb termodünaamika põhiseadusi ning oskab neid rakendada, sealhulgas ka füüsikalise ja keemilise tasakaalu kirjeldamisel;

learning_outcomes.en: * Knows main acid-base theories and can calculate pH of simple solutions
learning_outcomes.et: * tunneb põhilisi hapete ja aluste teooriaid ning oskab arvutada lihtsamate lahuste pH;

learning_outcomes.en: * Can balance redox equations and knows the basics of electrochemistry
learning_outcomes.et: * oskab tasakaalustada redoksreaktsioone, tunneb elektrokeemia põhialuseid;

learning_outcomes.en: * Knows the basics of chemical kinetics and can use rate laws
learning_outcomes.et: * tunneb keemilise kineetika põhialuseid ja oskab kasutada kineetika põhivõrrandeid;

learning_outcomes.en: * Knows the most important inorganic compounds (incl. complexes), their nomenclature and reactions
learning_outcomes.et: * tunneb olulisemaid anorgaanilisi keemilisi ühendeid (k.a kompleksühendid), nende nomenklatuuri ja reaktsioone;

description.et:
Test: To pass the first test of the detailed study outcomes (see study materials) must be acquired:
Grade A at least 90%
Grade B at least 80%
Grade C at least 70%
Grade D at least 60%
Grade E at least 50%

Test: To pass the second test of the detailed study outcomes (see study materials) must be acquired:
Grade A at least 90%
Grade B at least 80%
Grade C at least 70%
Grade D at least 60%
Grade E at least 50%

grade_preconditions.et: The results of 2 tests must exceed the 50% limit.

grade_evaluation.et: According to the results of the 2 tests, if a student gets A, he/she must defend their grade at the oral examination.

debt_elimination.et: Each test can be retaken once during the semester (before the next test) and in case of a good reason for missing a test (sickness etc). One test can be retaken during the exam session.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

resources.mandatory_materials:
Peter Atkins, Loretta Jones, Chemical Principles: The Quest for Insight. W. H. Freeman and Company
http://www.whfreeman.com/chemicalprinciples
